snippet.title: KindFolx Preview Trailer
snippet.description:
KindFolx, a city where Humankind and Monsterfolx live in peace has been taken over by a cruel Monsterfolk General and given birth to a new era of human oppression and violence. Can you and the Adventurers Guild defeat Darlocke and the evil at the heart of the city in this real-time deckbuilder?

Coming Early 2022!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1408730/KindFolx/
https://www.trismakesgames.com/kindfolx
https://twitter.com/kindfolx
